Transaction State Context.Ticket Purchase: Occurs when the fallback function is triggered by sending funds.
Transaction State Context.Winner Calculation: The contract calculates the winner based on the block hash after each round.
Transaction State Context.Cash Payout: Once the winner is determined, the payout is sent to the winner.

External Interactions.Ether Transfers: Ether is transferred to the contract when tickets are purchased, and to the winner when cashed out.
